abstract: The delay announced on Wednesday left the company just six months to test and certify the six planes in the testing program.
snippet: The delay announced on Wednesday left the company just six months to test and certify the six planes in the testing program.
lead_paragraph: Boeing said yesterday that it would delay the first test flight of the 787 Dreamliner by about three months, the first significant setback to the development of the fastest-selling commercial aircraft in history.

headline.main: 787’s Test Flight Is Delayed, but Not Delivery, Boeing Says
headline.print_headline: 787’s Test Flight Is Delayed, But Not Delivery, Boeing Says
